Visibility: 1.0 km

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow with visibilities at times less than 2 kilometres. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35. Forecast issued 06:17 AM MDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow with visibilities frequently less than 1 kilometre. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 39. Forecast issued 06:17 AM MDT Thursday 21 April 2016
